title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - CCC Intelligent Solutions gains better efficiency with Oracle to AWS PostgreSQL
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - CCC智能解决方案通过Oracle到AWS PostgreSQL迁移获得更高效率
abstract: CCC Intelligent Solutions (CCC), a leading digital solutions provider for the insurance and automotive industries, successfully migrated their critical databases from Oracle to PostgreSQL, leveraging AWS RDS and Aurora PostgreSQL. This strategic move eliminated Perpetual Unlimited License Agreement (PULA) cost and generated additional savings on a monthly basis. The migration involved massive, highly transactional databases, with one critical database reaching 170TB in size. The 15-month project involved massive, highly transactional databases (more than 15 Oracle databases), including a critical 170TB database supporting 80% of their workloads. This presentation is brought to you by Cognizant, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: CCC智能解决方案公司（CCC）是保险和汽车行业领先的数字解决方案提供商，成功将其关键数据库从Oracle迁移到PostgreSQL，利用AWS RDS和Aurora PostgreSQL。这一战略举措消除了永久无限许可协议（PULA）成本，并每月产生额外节省。迁移涉及大规模、高事务性数据库，其中一个关键数据库达到170TB。这个为期15个月的项目涉及大规模、高事务性数据库（超过15个Oracle数据库），包括一个支持80%工作负载的关键170TB数据库。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cognizant为您呈现。
